title: The secret life of plankton
description: New videography techniques have opened up the oceans' microscopic ecosystem, revealing it to be both mesmerizingly beautiful and astoundingly complex. Marine biologist Tierney Thys teamed with Christian Sardet (CNRS/Tara Oceans), Noé Sardet and Sharif Mirshak to use footage from the Plankton Chronicles project to create a film designed to ignite wonder and curiosity about this hidden world that underpins our own food chain.
author: Tierney Thys and Plankton Chronicles Project
keywords: TED, talks, TED-Ed, oceans, animals, fish, animation, diversity, education, marine biology, climate change, biology
